official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide higher rates of basic pay for Federal employees within Mercer County, New Jersey.

summary.text: Provides for higher rates of basic pay (108 percent of otherwise applicable rates) for Federal employees in Mercer County, New Jersey.
